mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO T03_GEN_MEMBER ( GEN_NO , PER_NO , IS_ONWER , CREATE_USER , CREATE_DATE , CREATE_TIME ) VALUES ( #{GenNo} , #{PerNo} , #{IsOnwer} , #{CreateUser} , #{CreateDate} , #{CreateTime} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update: UPDATE T03_GEN_MEMBER SET GEN_NO = #{GenNo} , PER_NO = #{PerNo} , IS_ONWER = #{IsOnwer} , CREATE_USER = #{CreateUser} , CREATE_DATE = #{CreateDate} , CREATE_TIME = #{CreateTime} WHERE ID = #{ID}
mapper.select: SELECT ID AS "ID" , GEN_NO AS "GenNo" , PER_NO AS "PerNo" , IS_ONWER AS "IsOnwer" , CREATE_USER AS "CreateUser" , CREATE_DATE AS "CreateDate" , CREATE_TIME AS "CreateTime" FROM T03_GEN_MEMBER WHERE ID = #{ID}

SELECT ID AS "ID" , GEN_NO AS "GenNo" , PER_NO AS "PerNo" , IS_ONWER AS "IsOnwer" , CREATE_USER AS "CreateUser" , CREATE_DATE AS "CreateDate" , CREATE_TIME AS "CreateTime" FROM T03_GEN_MEMBER WHERE ID = #{ID} FOR UPDATE

SELECT ID AS "ID" , GEN_NO AS "GenNo" , PER_NO AS "PerNo" , IS_ONWER AS "IsOnwer" , CREATE_USER AS "CreateUser" , CREATE_DATE AS "CreateDate" , CREATE_TIME AS "CreateTime" FROM T03_GEN_MEMBER WHERE ${_dynamicWhereCondition} ORDER BY ID ORDER BY ${_orderByCondition} FETCH FIRST ${_fetchFirstCondition} ROWS ONLY LIMIT ${_limitCondition} OFFSET ${_offsetCondition}
